title: Practice tool feedback and sugguestions.
body:
#What to add
* Baron spawner 
* Option to revert your lvl lower (Opposite of the auto level up)
* Auto spawn jungle camps or specific camps at once
* Have epic monsters , jungle camps and minions ALL scale with your current level
meaning if i skip to lvl 18 and spawn elder .. its not 100% accurate because the HP/stats only go up with level and the level is only gone up if a certain amount of time has passed and then respawning it.
* Allow 5 enemy dummies to be placed (not sure if i couldn't add the 5th since i had a warwick bot in the game who seemed to be AFK in the base the whole time XD)
* Add advanced {{champion:157}}  themed training dummies that can move ( bascially a wooden yasuo in a trashcan on wheels that can move in a desired direction, pattern etc. 
* Option to invite your friends with you in this mode. You could have a perma 5v5 where you and your friends can just kill each other over and over while testing fun builds and never having to worry about minions auto ending the game etc.

Practice tool is fun,  very useful and holds much potential :D

replies.body: I agree with everything here, but I would also like the ability to increase the level and revive the bots.
Locking in your level should lock in the scaling of everything else. I'd like to practice low-level CSing but since the creeps keep scaling it gets kinda pointless.

Moving dummies would be pretty sweet. Been practicing {{champion:98}} taunt flashes and would love to be able make it a bit harder. Right now the only way to get a moving target is by bullying the {{champion:51}} bot I almost always use.

I would also like skins for the dummies. There are no Yasuo, Vayne, Jayce etc bots so i can't beat them up :( The closest i can get to destroying a champion i hate is Caitlyn bot but shes stupid as hell and piles all her traps on top of each other. Not very satisfying
